name: places/ChIJnc2xl6NYwokRAmxdTWLUw8I
formattedAddress: 1150 Park Ave #1D, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1150 Park Ave #1D, New York, NY 10128-1244, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Rayfield is personable, thorough and communicates well.  He spent a significant amount of time with me taking a full history, offering some possible explanations for the complaint that I presented and he then formulated a well thought out plan of investigative testing.
When I saw him for follow up after results were back, again, we engaged in thoughtful conversation which resulted in some sensible advice and plans for further yearly follow up.
It was a pleasure to discourse with someone as well educated and frankly "seasoned" as Dr. Rayfield and I found him to be well-versed and up-to-date in terms of his knowledge base.
As a health professional myself, his attentiveness and attention to details was appreciated.  As a patient, you will appreciate not feeling rushed during your appointment, especially if you have several ongoing conditions or health issues to be investigated or treated.

originalText.text: Dr Rayfield is a wonderful, patient and compassionate doctor. After blood tests showed vitamin D deficiency, he gave me a prescription for a high IUD of Vitamin D. Since then, I've reduced my Vitamin D intake, but my overall energy level has improved dramatically. Thank you!

text.text: Dr Rayfield is a wonderful, patient and compassionate doctor. After blood tests showed vitamin D deficiency, he gave me a prescription for a high IUD of Vitamin D. Since then, I've reduced my Vitamin D intake, but my overall energy level has improved dramatically. Thank you!

originalText.text: I am proud to say that I have been a patient of Dr. Rayfield's for a little over 10 years, and I thank him for consistantly providing care which is individualized, compassionate, expert, and responsive to my needs. I recognize Dr. Rayfield for the quality of his medical practice and sincerely appreciate the difference that he's made in my life.

text.text: I am proud to say that I have been a patient of Dr. Rayfield's for a little over 10 years, and I thank him for consistantly providing care which is individualized, compassionate, expert, and responsive to my needs. I recognize Dr. Rayfield for the quality of his medical practice and sincerely appreciate the difference that he's made in my life.

originalText.text:
As a long-term diabetes sufferer, spanning 25 years, I have nothing but praise and appreciation for the level of care received thus far.

The amount and quality of time received by Dr. Rayfield has given me a new perspective on my disease and boosted my confidence in my ability to fight diabetes.

After years of treatment from a variety of endocrinologists, I am now confident of my ability to gain an upper hand against the ravages of diabetes.

Thank you Dr. Rayfield.

Best Wishes,

Andy Wist

originalText.text: Dr Rayfield is a great caring proactive doctor. They don’t make him like that anymore. He’s calm, available, attentive, and knowledgeable. A great choice if you’re searching for an experienced practitioner.
